snippet.title: January Update & HCS 2024 Roadmap | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
Halo Infinite’s next free update arrives on January 30 and year three of Halo esports kicks off on February 3!  

Halo Infinite’s CU29 brings a new map, new Operations, the legendary Mark IV Armor Core and new customization rewards, new Forge content and features, support for multi-use shoulders, and more.  

A new year of Halo esports begins on February 3 with the HCS 2024 Open Series! Learn more about the HCS roadmap and new team customization content coming in 2024.

Learn more at:
https://aka.ms/CU29Livestream
https://halo.gg/


#HaloInfinite #Halo

--- 

Connect with us!

Discord: https://discord.gg/Halo

Halo Support
Website: https://aka.ms/HaloSupport
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HaloSupport

00:00:00 - Introduction
00:02:03 - Halo Infinite's Customization Updates
00:09:18 - Upcoming Operations
00:14:06 - New Map: Illusion
00:19:23 - New Forge Additions
00:32:25 - Future Playlist Updates
00:46:06 - Networking Update
00:48:52 - Upcoming Features
00:50:30 - Ranked Updates
00:52:30 - HCS Team Skins
00:59:25 - HCS 2023 Roadmap
01:03:35 - Outro
